explanation: [0-0] In a room, a person is sitting in front of a white wall. He is wearing a yellow and orange camouflage hoodie and holding a tablet. He pulls the zipper of his hoodie all the way up to cover his face, with a white data cable extending from the hoodie. To his left, there is a white wall with colorful lights on it. Some items are placed on the green desktop, and the words "PUBG" are printed on a yellow and black board. A mobile phone stand is fixed on the table in front of the man. Below is a game screen, with the white subtitle "PIKA BTW PIKA BTW" at the top of the screen. There is a red logo on the left side of the two words, with an explosion mark in the middle.

[0-5] The game screen is aiming at an off-road vehicle parked in the distance. The game character shoots twice at the parked vehicle. The game character is also wearing a yellow and orange camouflage hoodie. Then, the game character moves to the right on the mountain. The lights on the white wall are changing.
